channel.title: Quick simple question!
channel.description: Hello Rsps\mopar community! My first time back on here since 2009, and i have 2 quick questions! How would I go about making all of my shop items free? I know how to change the price to 0...but i don't want to individually select all 15,000 one by one and type 0. Easier method? :)

item.title: Quick simple question!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Wintercanon, post:5, topic:520500”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=638999.msg4307220#msg4307220 date=1370086398]

Remove the line of code that checks if a player has the right quantity of gold to purchase a shop item?

Essentially what I just said in less details.
[/quote]Essentially every server doesn’t have a buyitem method.[/quote]
They have some method that handles items for coins.
Regardless of the name, that is the “buyitem” method.

Read full topic

@sk8rdude461 wrote:
